page.title: 07Home Life 1 - Yardley
page.content: On Saturday I got up at 7.30.At 8.30 I was picked up by the milkman I work for I delivered the milk round the flats and tidied up the float.At 9.55 I went to the cafe for sausage and tomato sandwich and a cup of tea.I then went back to work until 2.10.I went home,had a bath and got changed and caught the bus to Erdington to meet my friend at the Social Services centre.He was there doing community service.On this particular day he was helping put a fire extinguisher in a car which was then towed to Birmingham Wheels race track for a banger race that evening.We got there at 6.30,had a jumbo hot dog [my first real meal of the day]and watched some races.Our driver had a bump in his first race but came fourth in his second.Afterwards we took the car back and I got a lift home,getting in at 11.00 and going to bed.
